snippet.description: Do the same, but better 10.09.2010 / 9:57 AM ET Even with a 3-2 loss Friday, many of the Blue Jackets players found a lot of good things to take with them from their first game. They all repeated how they felt they had been the better team 5-on-5, and recounted their scoring chances against the Sharks. snippet.title: Dallas goalie Smith a Tragically Hip figure
snippet.description: ten times better and owns about seven guitars, and even has one that stays on the Stars' charter plane for extended road trips. His road roommate, left wing Brad Winchester, also plays guitar. Smith says the two enjoy jamming together on the road. Not at home, though, as the two need to be apart, Smith jokes. And throughout the years, Smith's love for The Hip has stayed strong. He caught the band...
